blocks.content: **Davis CoPilot is Dynatrace's generative AI which allows you to explore data through natural language, and helps with onboarding and boosting productivity.**

blocks.title: Quick analysis with Davis CoPilot
blocks.description: Translate your natural language questions and commands to DQL queries.

blocks.title: See Quick Analysis in action in Notebooks and Dashboards
blocks.description: These resources can help you prepare for demo's and provide inspiration for what's already possible with Davis CoPilot.

blocks.title: [PREVIEW] Quick answers with Davis CoPilot
blocks.description: Ask any product question and get quick answers from our documentation, community, website etc.

blocks.content:
### Tips when doing your demo
* Show off Davis CoPilot's **multi-lingual capabilities** by testing examples in different languages (if this is relevant to your audience).
* Take requests from the audience to see if Davis CoPilot can manage their on-demand requests. This makes the demo feel a bit more "real" and less scripted.

##### Quick analysis in Notebooks and Dashboards
* **Test all examples in advance** to make sure that the expected data is actually available in the environment, within the expected timeframe. 
* If you're doing a demo in a customer environment, prepare some examples that will **query their own 'custom' data** (e.g. custom metrics, business data). Note: environment-aware queries must be enabled for this to work.
* If your customer is concerned about the cost of auto-executing queries, highlight the fact that you can now "Generate DQL only" without the execution step. 

##### Quick answers in conversational interface [PREVIEW]
* **Test all examples in advance** to make sure that the Davis CoPilot returns the expected result
* If your customer recently had an interesting question – see if Davis CoPilot can answer this on the spot. 
* Don't expect the conversational interface to generate accurate DQL – only the integration in Notebooks and Dashboards has been optimized to generate DQL.

##### Have more questions?
If you have any questions, please refer to this [internal FAQ doc](https://dynatrace.sharepoint.com/:w:/s/RnD/EczxV83HHo9OgHpie-W3laUBuwTQ8iSqSq7YFJr8xGUbAg?e=AiCodI). If you have any feedback or ideas, please reach out on **#help-davis-copilot**.

blocks.title: [COMING SOON] Conversation starters
blocks.description: Ask Davis CoPilot to explain concepts directly from these apps
